name: tothlus
description: AI学習サポート機能のMVPアプリケーション

scripts.build: npm run build --prefix=web && npm run build --prefix=functions
scripts.lint: npm run lint --prefix=web && npm run lint --prefix=functions
scripts.test: npm run test --prefix=web && npm run test --prefix=functions
scripts.test:coverage: npm run test:coverage --prefix=web && npm run test:coverage --prefix=functions
scripts.test:ci: npm run test:ci --prefix=web && npm run test:ci --prefix=functions
